conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through channels and baffles to predict which container it will flow into.
Observe the flow of liquid through channels A, B, C, D, E, F, and G.
Identify the direction of the liquid flow as it passes through the baffles.
Determine which container (E, F, or G) the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles.
The liquid will flow into container G after passing through the baffles.
